title: Online Course for Strengthening Basic Competencies in Refrigeration and Air Conditioning Fundamentals

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic electrical circuit concepts and operation of simple measurement tools
context.additional_context: Practice simulation-centered education via smartphone-based LMS, with formative assessments to monitor step-by-step learning outcomes.

learning_goals: Explain the basic principles of the refrigeration cycle (compression-condensation-expansion-evaporation) with 80% accuracy
Successfully assemble a simple electrical wiring circuit three consecutive times using smartphone simulation tools
Operate three preset modes (ON/OFF) of a basic PLC interface with 100% accuracy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
